Entries.Carmen.FishingQuest.HandInDialogue: Thank you so much @. Here is your reward.

Entries.72860001: Basic/Ignorance and Bliss/Bliss said something vague about coming to the abandoned greenhouse after midnight... Maybe it's worth checking out?/Go the abandoned greenhouse after midnight..//-1/0/-1/true/
Entries.72860002: Basic/A Note from the Ninjas/You read a note on the base's door that said to return tonight to meet the Seer./Come to the Ridge after 8 PM on a clear night..//-1/0/-1/true/
Entries.72860003:
Basic/Open the Portal/Belinda and Raeriyala have asked you to gather the nine Blessed Artifacts and find the pedestal placement that makes the foxes' eyes glow. You can read about the artifacts in the red book in the ninja house./Gather the nine relics and place them
in the correct order on the pedestals..//-1/0/-1/true/
Entries.72860004: Basic/The Cursed Greenhouse/When you returned to the mountain trail, Bliss said something about a "curse" and suggested you come back when the greenhouse is open at night./Return to the abandoned greenhouse after midnight..//-1/0/-1/true/
Entries.72860005: Basic/Preparations Complete!/Now that you've collected all the strange objects Daia asked for, return to the ninja house tomorrow for further instruction./Return to the ninja house tomorrow..//-1/0/-1/true/
Entries.72860006: Basic/More Preparations/Belinda told you to come to the Ridge Forest tomorrow to help her "unseal her beloved"./Go to the Ridge Forest on a sunny day before 7 PM..//-1/0/-1/true/
Entries.72860007: Basic/The Unsealing/Bliss has instructed you to come to the Ridge tonight for the Unsealing./Come to the Ridge on a clear night after 8 PM..//-1/0/-1/true/
Entries.72860500: Location/The Falls of Companionship/Hints of an underground waterfall can be found in the Ridge Forest. It's rumored to bless the ones who value friendship./Find the hidden waterfalls with lush green foliage in the Ridge Forest./Custom_Ridgeside_MysticFalls1/-1/74/-1/true/
Entries.72860501: Location/The Falls of Love/Hints of an underground waterfall can be found in the Ridge Forest. It's rumored to bless the ones who value love./Find the hidden waterfalls surrounded by pink trees and sand in the Ridge Forest./Custom_Ridgeside_MysticFalls2/-1/500/-1/true/
Entries.72860502: Location/The Falls of Sacrifice/Hints of an underground waterfall can be found in the Ridge Forest. It's rumored to bless the ones who are curious about the unseen./Find the hidden waterfalls surrounded by the dark in the Ridge Forest./Custom_Ridgeside_MysticFalls3/-1/8/-1/true/
Entries.72861000: ItemDelivery/Void Experiment/Mr. Aguar requires some void essence for his experiment./Deliver 10 Void Essence to Mr. Aguar./Aguar 769 10/-1/1000/-1/true/Marvelous work, @. Here's my payment. Now if you'll excuse me...
Entries.72861001:
ItemDelivery/Fairy Stone Errand/I am in need of a Fairy Stone. I'll be sure to pay you plenty if you provide me with what I desire.
        -Mr. Aguar.

- 500g on Delivery
- Mr. Aguar will be thankful/Deliver a Fairy Stone to Mr. Aguar./Aguar 577/-1/500/-1/true/This is adequate. Here's your payment. Now, if you'll excuse me...
Entries.72861002:
ItemDelivery/Aquamarine Errand/I am in need of an Aquamarine. I'll be sure to pay you plenty if you provide me with what I desire.
        -Mr. Aguar.

- 400g on Delivery
- Mr. Aguar will be thankful/Deliver an Aquamarine to Mr. Aguar./Aguar 62/-1/400/-1/true/This is adequate. Here's your payment. Now, if you'll excuse me...
Entries.72861003: ItemDelivery/Panicking Husband/Olga is mad at me, but I know how to make her happy! I need some honey for my honey-bunny./Bring Honey to Bert./Bert 340 1/-1/300/-1/true/You brought it! Thank you so much! I hope she forgives me!$h
Entries.72861004:
ItemDelivery/Orange Man Bert/I want to start an Orange Juice business! I need someone to supply me with some oranges... At least 3 of 'em!
        -Bert.

- 900g on Delivery
- Bert will be thankful/Deliver 3 oranges to Bert./Bert 635 3/-1/900/-1/true/Orange you glad I didn't ask for bananas? Thanks a bunch, @!
Entries.72861005:
ItemDelivery/A Nostalgic Taste/It's been so long since I tasted a Cave Carrot. If anyone brings me some I'll give them some coins.
        -Ezekiel.

- 200g on Delivery
- Ezekiel will be thankful/Deliver a Cave Carrot to Ezekiel./Ezekiel 78/-1/200/-1/true/Bah, this tastes disgusting. Though it does remind me of old times.#$b#Thanks.
Entries.72861006:
Monster/A Wonderful Hobby/Has anyone heard of the Pepper Rex? They're quite fun to hunt! I challenge anyone to slay 10 of them and I'll reward you handsomely. Good luck!
        -Freddie.

- 4000g on completion/Slay 10 Pepper Rexes./Pepper_Rex 10 Freddie/-1/4000/-1/true/
Entries.72861007:
Monster/Brutal Shadows/Shadow Brutes are dangerous feral beasts. Slay some Shadow Brutes to bring peace to the valley. Go forth, young adventurer.
        -Freddie.

- 3000g on Completion/Slay 10 Shadow Brutes./Shadow_Brute 10 Freddie/-1/3000/-1/true/
Entries.72861008: LostItem/An Old Friend/Freddie his old sword. He only remembers standing next to a waterfall./Find Freddie's sword and bring it back to him./Freddie 3058 Custom_Ridgeside_RidgesideVillage 65 108/-1/500/-1/true/There you are, old friend. Thank you, @!$h
Entries.72861009:
ItemDelivery/A Harmless Prank/So... my dad won't buy me a bomb. So I posted this instead! If anyone has one, bring one to me and I'll pay you with my savings! Quick! Before they remove this again!
        -Keahi.

- 1000g on Delivery
- Keahi will be thankful
- Citizens will be concerned/Deliver a Bomb to Keahi./Keahi 287/-1/1000/-1/true/No one saw you right? Awesome! See ya, @! Thanks again!$h
Entries.72861010: ItemDelivery/The Slime King/Keahi wants to collect slime as a new hobby. Don't tell his dad./Bring 10 Slime to Keahi./Keahi 766 10/-1/500/-1/true/These are incredibly slimy. It's gross! But also AWESOME!? Thank you! I am now the Slime King!$4
Entries.72861011:
ItemDelivery/Toe May Toe/Can anyone bring me a big fat juicy tomato? It's for a secret project.
        -Keahi.

- 200g on Delivery
- Keahi will be thankful
- Keahi will spare you/Deliver a Tomato to Keahi./Keahi 256/-1/200/-1/true/It's perfect, @! This is going to be epic!$h
Entries.72861012:
ItemDelivery/Healthy Salad/I saw this intriguing recipe for an eggplant salad and it requires an eggplant. Bring me an eggplant. I'll pay!
        -Lenny.

- 200g on Delivery
- Lenny will be thankful/Deliver an Eggplant to Lenny./Lenny 272/-1/200/-1/true/It's finally here! Thanks a lot, @! I'm going to have a healthy dinner tonight!$h
Entries.72861013:
ItemDelivery/Stress Reliever/Can anyone bring me some wine? I need to de-stress. I can't promise I won't finish the whole bottle in one night.
        -Lenny.

- 1000g on Delivery
- Lenny will be thankful/Deliver a Wine to Lenny./Lenny 348/-1/1000/-1/true/Ah! I've been longing for this! Thank you, @.
Entries.72861014:
Monster/Best of the Best/Anyone up for a challenge? I'll pay you handsomely if you manage to slay 20 Haunted Skulls. Be a dear and slay some for me.
        -Lola.

- 10000g on Completion/Slay 20 Haunted Skulls./Haunted_Skull 20 Lola/-1/10000/-1/true/
Entries.72861015:
Monster/Slime Slayer/I'm sick of all these slimey slimes. Slay a couple of Green Slimes for me, dear. I'll pay. 
        -Lola.

- 750g on Completion/Slay 10 Green Slimes./Green_Slime 10 Lola/-1/750/-1/true/
Entries.72861016:
ItemDelivery/Cuppa Coffee/I think I might try some coffee. I'm getting a bit sick of slurping tea all day. I'll pay.
        -Olga.

- 250g on Delivery
- Olga will be thankful/Deliver Coffee to Olga./Olga 395/-1/250/-1/true/Thank you, @! This is much better than tea!
Entries.72861017: ItemDelivery/Tuna Craving/The Lidens are craving Tuna. They have asked you to deliver one to them. Take the Tuna to Olga./Deliver 1 Tuna to Olga./Olga 130 1/-1/400/-1/true/Oh hey you've delivered it! It's fresh too! Great job @!$h
Entries.72861018:
ItemDelivery/Cheesy Memory/I need some cheese to make a childhood dish of mine. I want to my son to taste the dish that made me passionate about cooking.
        -Pika.

- 800g on Delivery
- Pika will be thankful/Deliver Cheese to Pika./Pika 424/-1/800/-1/true/Mahalo! Thank you! I can't wait to start cooking!$h
Entries.72861019: ItemDelivery/Mayo Surprise/Pika needs mayonnaise for his new recipe and he asked you to deliver one to him./Deliver 1 Mayonnaise to Pika./Pika 306 1/-1/600/-1/true/Mahalo, @! Thank you! This is quality mayo! Here's your payment, as promised!$h
Entries.72861020:
ItemDelivery/Ember Island Dish/I've been missing a certain Ember Island dish for quite some time now. I need some Starfruit, though. If anyone can bring me one I'll be really thankful.
        -Pika.

- 2000g on Delivery
- Pika will be thankful/Deliver Starfruit to Pika./Pika 268/-1/2000/-1/true/Mahalo! Thank you! I've been looking everywhere for this! Thank you once again, @!$h
Entries.72861021:
Monster/Drats, bats!/Bats have been hanging around the hotel at night lately! They're spooky! I need someone to slay a number of them in the mines so they stop flying over.
        -Richard.

- 1000g on Delivery
- Richard will be thankful/Slay 20 Bats./Bat 20 Richard/-1/1000/-1/true/
Entries.72861022:
ItemDelivery/Expensive Cuisine/I'm planning to add some more dishes for the room service menu for the hotel. One of the guests suggested Caviar. Bring me some. I'll pay handsomely.
        -Richard.

- 3000g on Delivery
- Richard will be thankful/Deliver Caviar to Richard./Richard 445/-1/3000/-1/true/This is some good quality caviar, @! I'm utmost grateful.$h
Entries.72861023: LostItem/Misplaced Glasses/Richard misplaced his glasses! The only thing he remembers is that he didn't leave the hotel the whole day./Find Richard's glasses and return them to him../Richard 3149 Custom_Ridgeside_LogCabinHotel2ndFloor 1 22/-1/300/-1/true/You found them? Ah! I am eternally grateful, @!$h
Entries.72861024:
ItemDelivery/Pink Dream/So I had this dream last night where I was living in a HUGE castle, it was made of cake... And it was PINK! Then I woke up and now I want to eat Pink Cake! Papa gave me money to pay for the delivery!
        -Trinnie.

- 600g on Delivery
- Trinnie will be thankful/Deliver Pink Cake to Trinnie./Trinnie 221/-1/600/-1/true/Yay! It's here! Thank you so much, @! Here's the monies!$h
Entries.72861025:
ItemDelivery/Poppy Drawing/I need a Poppy flower! I'm having a hard time drawing one! Someone PLEASE bring me one! Thank you!
        -Trinnie.

- 400g on Delivery
- Trinnie will be thankful/Poppy for Trinnie./Trinnie 376/-1/400/-1/true/Oh! It looks pretty! Thank you, @! I'll start drawing ASAP!$h
Entries.72861026: ItemDelivery/Sunflower Princess/Trinnie needs sunflowers for the floral dress she is trying to make in order to become the Sunflower Princess!/Bring 10 Sunflowers to Trinnie./Trinnie 421 10/-1/2000/-1/true/The flowers are here! I'm so happy!! Thank you so much, @!!$h
Entries.72861027:
ItemDelivery/A Kid's Wish/It's fine if no one accepts this. But if anyone can, I just want to taste a Survival Burger again, it's been so long since I had one. But yeah... It's no big deal. Thank you.
        -Yuuma.

- 300g on Delivery
- Yuuma will be thankful/Deliver a Survival Burger to Yuuma./Yuuma 241/-1/300/-1/true/I've been wanting this for so long! Thank you so much, @!$h
Entries.72861028:
ItemDelivery/The Broken Swing/Shiro wants to fix the swing in front of the house but I won't let him. So I'll do it instead, but I need an Iron Bar. Can anyone bring me some? I'll pay... I promise. Thank you.
        -Yuuma.

- 300g on Delivery
- Yuuma will be thankful/Deliver an Iron Bar to Yuuma./Yuuma 335/-1/300/-1/true/Thank you for this, @, I'm glad you helped me out. I was a little scared to go into the mines to get it myself.
Entries.72861029: LostItem/Yuuma's Lost Ring/Yuuma lost his ring. He remembers still having the ring when he was buying stuff from Jeric's farm./Find Yuuma's ring and bring it back to him./Yuuma 3220 Custom_Ridgeside_RidgesideVillage 19 20/-1/200/-1/true/You found it!? Thank you so much, @! I'm really grateful!$h
